about_the_game:
The current live build contains the first Story “Midnight Investigator”
The more stories set in different locations will be added in future updates, I will be posting a development roadmap in the near future.
The main reason for this is to provide a more consistent stream of content while I work to develop the main game

--

Experience Five Nights at Freddy’s like never before
Explore stories set in the Fazbear Nightmare alternate timeline, challenge yourself with unique modes designed to offer new ways to play

As well as,
  • New Mechanics
    Use the new tools at to survive your stay at Freddy Fazbear pizza.
    Solve puzzles and uncover the truth behind the missing children incidents
  • New Locations
    Explore new locations not seen in the official FNaF games
  • New Story
    Built from the ground up using inspiration from all the Freddy expanded universe, explore a new (Non canon) story that shows a what-if scenario readapting the FNAF story to a more traditional survival horror narrative.
  • Side Content
    Unlock new and exciting ways to play, everything from hidden bonus stories or challenging alternate modes!

    This game is being designed with the intent to add new content over time, and I plan to continue to support the game as long as there’s interest from you the community
“This game is unofficial to the FNAF timeline and uses its own version of canon”
detailed_description:
The current live build contains the first Story “Midnight Investigator”
The more stories set in different locations will be added in future updates, I will be posting a development roadmap in the near future.
The main reason for this is to provide a more consistent stream of content while I work to develop the main game

--

Experience Five Nights at Freddy’s like never before
Explore stories set in the Fazbear Nightmare alternate timeline, challenge yourself with unique modes designed to offer new ways to play

As well as,
  • New Mechanics
    Use the new tools at to survive your stay at Freddy Fazbear pizza.
    Solve puzzles and uncover the truth behind the missing children incidents
  • New Locations
    Explore new locations not seen in the official FNaF games
  • New Story
    Built from the ground up using inspiration from all the Freddy expanded universe, explore a new (Non canon) story that shows a what-if scenario readapting the FNAF story to a more traditional survival horror narrative.
  • Side Content
    Unlock new and exciting ways to play, everything from hidden bonus stories or challenging alternate modes!

    This game is being designed with the intent to add new content over time, and I plan to continue to support the game as long as there’s interest from you the community
“This game is unofficial to the FNAF timeline and uses its own version of canon”
name: Fazbear Nightmare

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 2 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please note minimum specs subject to change over time with content updates
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game requires you own a steam copy of FNAF 4

short_description: The residents of Trillium County will know the feeling of an old wound. Time has passed and doors that seemed locked forever are opened once again and the timing couldn't be any worse.
